column4: no necessarily a ubuntu question, but I was builiding a new box, and now I can't fit my old ide ribbons in my old box....same cables
anyone helo?
wrong channel for that
i'm not sure, perhaps #hardware ? i have no idea
well people here usually help with hardware too
yes, that's true, but only when it has to do with ubuntu
i've had good experiences with DOSbox on mac os x
so that's what i'd recommend you try.
could you tell me how to get to dosbox prompt?
what happens when you just run dosbox
that's it, I don't know how to
type 'dosbox' ?
did you sudo apt-get install dosbox
why?
okay....
i suggest you just install it through apt
doing that now
can i ask you why you usually install programmes mostly from source?
mostly out of habit
that's completely unnecessary on just about all modern distros
what programme?
the config file is probably somewhere in /etc/
